title: Keep getting reported for something im not doing
body: i am a katarina main sice i was lvl 14 and recently i was added by people after games saying that they are reporting me for "scripting". at first i didnt kknow wat it was so i started to research on it. so basically its just a hack. i have been rported 4 times now for "scripting" when im not actually. now im scared that my acc is going to be banned for that reason. dont know what to do

replies.body:
Here's what you do: nothing. If you aren't using an exploit like scripting, then you won't get banned for it. In the *extreme* case that you're boy-cotted and a large sum of people work together to try and get you banned for something you're not doing, you can always apply for an appeal. A red will then investigate and deduce if you were really using an exploit or not. If you weren't, then you have nothing to fear.

Best of luck on the fields of juice.
